thread.title: More on the cover story: What's the mission for Spaceport Colorado? (Video)
thread.title_full: More on the cover story: What's the mission for Spaceport Colorado? (Video)

author: Kathleen Lavine
title: More on the cover story: What's the mission for Spaceport Colorado? (Video)
text:
Kathleen Lavine | Denver Business Journal Dave Ruppel, director, Front Range Airport Colorado leaders dream of remaking Front Range Airport , an airfield on the plains east of Denver, into a magnet for space tourists and industries. Despite setbacks that have clouded the future of the budding space-tourism industry, local leaders remain hopeful that Colorado one day will be a gateway to space. Greg Avery writes about Spaceport Colorado in this week's Denver Business Journal print-edition cover story, available to subscribers only until Sept. 14. In the video above , Dave Ruppel , director at Front Range Airport, talks about the vision for the spaceport.
